name: The Coronation of the Virgin
description: The Coronation of the Virgin; Master of Wauquelin's Alexander (Flemish, active about 1440 - 1460); Ghent (probably), Belgium; about 1450 - 1455; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 19.4 x 14 cm (7 5/8 x 5 1/2 in.); Ms. 2, fol. 115v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Coronation of the Virgin
medium: Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment
